A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It seems that most people who are rating this movie high are okay with the fact that this was\, in reality\, not a Star Wars movie\, and challenged the status quo. I am okay with this happening\, but without providing spoilers\, the changes were disrespectful and offensive to the franchise.

1. Rian Johnson either did not watch Episode 7 or saw it and then decided to flip off the watcher. He knows which questions and concerns people have been discussing for two years\, and he pretty much destroyed every answer and mystery we were looking forward to.

2. Don't publicly make comments that are lies about characters. You can't say someone is more powerful than past characters and not follow through. You can't  say a character has more screen time and not follow through. 

3. A good portion of the plot and conflict were useless. The plot holes so big that they could not be justified even for the sake of the movie. 

4. This is a personal opinion\, but they disrespected Luke's character to the max. iI was so mad with how he was portrayed... So sad...
